* You will contribute to a culture of innovation and curiosity within the team.
* You will collaborate with software engineers from other teams to deliver cross-team projects and promote best practices across the department.
* You will design and develop complex system components and deliver high-quality code contributions to applications targeting a range of interfaces, from mobile devices to 50+ touchscreens.
* You will mentor your peers, and promote best practices and engineering standards within the team.


Skills & Requirements


**Who You Are**


* You bring 4+ years of software engineering experience, preferably with proficiency in TypeScript and React.
* You can write dependable software and have experience with testing frameworks.
* You have experience working in agile environments and enjoy being part of a team that values learning, experimenting, and iterating quickly.
* You have a passion for mentoring peers and demonstrating best practices in design and coding standards through demos, group  

discussions and your own code contributions.
* You possess clear communication skills, both verbal and written.
* You thrive in a multicultural environment and are driven to make a real-world impact.


Great Place to Work


World leading technique


Top specialists as team peers


International environment


Fast paced & entrepreneurial culture


Warrant program


Wellness grant

title: User Research Specialist
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**Who We Are**
--------------


Volvo Penta is expanding our development organization for marine and industrial applications. We are currently seeking a User Research Specialist to join the Vehicle Interface team within Electronics and Software. The Vehicle Interface team focuses on creating user interactions in graphical displays and physical control devices. With complete product ownership, the team oversees end-to-end responsibilities for deliverables, documentation, verification, validation, and incorporating customer needs into new product roadmaps.

**Who are you?**
----------------


You are an experienced user research specialist with a background in conducting research for both digital and physical products in reputable companies. Your expertise lies in identifying user needs, pain points, and desires, fostering stakeholder collaboration to prioritize enhancements that significantly benefit users. Your track record includes translating research insights into design requirements for developing mid- to high-fidelity prototypes.  

  

**What You Bring**  

You find gratification in seamlessly transitioning between user research and prototyping, bringing insights to life and collecting authentic user feedback. Your ability to swiftly navigate between these phases showcases your dedication to enhancing user experiences.

  

Your Role  

As a key team member, you will:

* Lead and conduct user-centered research, overseeing the process from initiation to implementation to provide clear direction for product development.
* Effectively communicate research findings and strategies to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Promote awareness and understanding at Volvo Penta about the benefits and importance of user-centered research, emphasizing anticipated outcomes.
* Mentor and support junior user-centered researchers, prototype developers, HMI engineers, and UX designers.
* Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams, including business leaders, engineers, and other stakeholders, to propel successful product development.
**Qualifications**
------------------

* Master’s degree in a relevant field like Human-Computer Interaction, Design, or a related discipline.
* 8+ years of experience in user-centered research and UX design.
* Profound understanding of user-centered research principles, both quantitative and qualitative, and best practices.
* Excellent communication, collaboration, and presentation skills, with proficiency in graphical and video creation tools.
* Experience in impact mapping, empathy mapping, value proposition canvas, or related methodologies.
* Skilled in leading teams of fellow researchers, developers, and designers.
**Are you the one?**
--------------------


Please contact Robert Broström, Manager Vehicle Interface.  

Email, LinkedIn, +46739026427

  

Last Application Date: September 15th

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Volvo Penta**, a world-leading supplier of engines and complete drive systems for marine and industrial applications, you will be part of a global and diverse team of highly skilled professionals who works with passion, trust each other and embraces change to stay ahead. We make our customers win.

title: UX/UI Software Engineering Specialist
description:
**Company Description** **We Power Your Performance. You Amplify The World.**


Founded in 1979, Lab Gruppen’s name is one of the most respected professional-grade power amplifier manufacturers in the world. At Lab Gruppen, we recognize the musician within you, enhancing your performance with reliable amplification. We strive to provide professional-grade power that lets you focus on your artistry, freeing your creativity to command the stage. Our renowned amplifiers offer the reliability and quality you need to amplify your voice, connecting audiences to the essence of your music. We empower your performance, allowing you to bring your music to the world, amplifying the joy, unity, and transformative power of sound.

 **Job Description**  

Fuel your passion at Lab Gruppen, where we've been amplifying excellence since 1979. As a UX/UI Software Engineering Specialist, you're not just coding; you're composing the user experience symphony.


Join us as the positive troublemaker, the unstoppable energy behind cutting-edge solutions. Be deeply purpose-driven, customer-obsessed, and digitally minded. Your disruptive spirit will shape interfaces that resonate with musicians worldwide.


At Lab Gruppen, we amplify not just sound but the transformative power of music. If you're ready to bring your energy to a team that values innovation and purpose, let's amplify the joy of sound together.

 **Qualifications*** UX/UI Software Engineering and Brand Experience Implementation and Operation
* Digital Twin, Simulation and DFX Implementation and Operation
* Automation and Compliance Implementation and Operation
* Performance and Analytics Implementation and Operation
* Cost Efficiency Implementation and Operation

 **Additional Information** **Our Values**  

* Be Kind
* Be Clear
* Collaborate
* Deliver to Promise
* Celebrate
**Our Culture**  

* Deeply Purpose Driven and Passionate
* Unstoppable Energy Giver and "Positive Troublemaker"
* Truly Customer Obsessed
* Disruptive and Digitally Minded
* Social and Planetary Advocate

title: UX/UI Designer  Intern
description:
We are a pioneering technology company harnessing the power of machine learning and advanced research to deliver exceptional augmented reality (AR) solutions for industrial enterprises.
 



  





 Our innovative AR technology revolutionizes traditional work methods, inspiring new ways of thinking and unlocking groundbreaking solutions that were previously beyond reach in industry and machine operations.
 



  





 You will be a part of the Design team.
 



  





 In your role, you will be a part of shaping our future product with focus on our application for both Mobile devices and Head mounted XR glasses.
 



  





  





**You will among other things be work with:** 




  




* Be involved in all stages of the design process within projects; from research, workshops, idea generation, concepts to prototypes and delivery of design.
* Create marketing content and be a part of taking our product to market.
* Create interaction design through customer journeys, sketches, wireframes and prototypes based on insights.
* Use creative tools like Figma and other suitable design software in the XR space.
* Conducting deep interviews and workshops for user research and product testing.
* Monitor and design the interface for head-mounted XR glasses and how the user should integrate with the software (e.g. Hand movements, eye tracking, etc.)



  





**To succeed in this role, you should have** 




  




* Previous of relevant work experience in UX/UI and
 **XR Design** 
 (
 **Meritorious)**
* An ability to easily communicate and work with others in teams, both with colleagues and customers.
* A self-propelled working method
* An ability to choose the tools and methods that best suit each specific situation.
* A user-focused mindset – a passionate drive for understanding and meeting user needs.
* Experience with Figma
* Open mindset to try new working methods and software tools that just launched on the market.



  





**What we offer** 



* Practical experience of e.g. product development in the AR-Space 🕵️
* Opportunity to contribute directly to the growth of an exciting Startup 💪
* Remote work and flex Office spaces 👩‍💻
* Freedom under own responsibility 🤓
* Strategic work and planning 📊
* Be part of a product launch 🚀



  





**This is a unpaid internship initially**
